thread.title: There's a National Donor Organ Shortage. Overdose Victims Could Help Change That

title: There's a National Donor Organ Shortage. Overdose Victims Could Help Change That
text:
Home » Uncategorized » There's a National Donor Organ Shortage. Overdose Victims Could Help Change That There's a National Donor Organ Shortage. Overdose Victims Could Help Change That 
“We really hope that our study helps reassure patients and providers who are trying to make a decision about whether or not to accept an organ from an overdose death donor,” says Dr. Christine Durand, an assistant professor of medicine at Johns Hopkins Medicine and a co-author of the study, which … Read more: Your email address will not be published.
